location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter no.148 from Commodore George Robinson, Commanding Officer Persian Gulf Squadron, to Captain Arnold Kemball, Resident in the Persian Gulf

mods.abstract: Robinson reports on his meeting with the British agent at Sharjah, Hajee Yacoob, who has intelligence on the sale and transport of indigo plundered from the British vessel Centaur, at Aggur and Fuggeerah [Fujairah]. Robinson reports that he has spoken to Sheikh Sultan bin Saqr about reports of indigo at Fujairah.
